content.rendered:
The Right Choice for You Who
Love Ocean View

More Details The Right Choice for You Who
Love Ocean View More Details The Right Choice for You Who
Love Ocean View More Details

The breathtaking view of the sea is now right in front of your eyes with Pantai Mutiara Pluit housing complex, a prestigious residential area with a strategic location in the coastal Jakarta. Pamper yourself in the luxury of this finest residence, built with a private dock for direct access to the high seas.

Locations

Pantai Mutiara is located in famous Pluit area that close enough to the coast and many of the most popular restaurants and cafes in Jakarta, perfect for you who want to enjoy beauty of the sea as well as having fun and tongue pampering.

Going anywhere is easier

Transportation

  • Soekarno Hatta International Aiport

Shopping & Ritel Centers

  • Emporium Mall
  • Jetski Cafe
  • Baywalk Mall

Sport Center

  • Pantai Mutiara Sport Center

Facilities

GYM

24 HOURS SECURITY

PRIVATE YATCH PORT

24-hour Security

Private Yatch Port

Commercial Area

Sports Club

Awards

2015
The First & The Best Reclamation Residentials Property & Bank Awards 2015

Enter your information below
to get best deals from Pantai Mutiara








    Related Properties

    Graha Natura

    Griya Semanan

    Telaga Bestari

    Pantai Mutiara

    The Perfect Ocean View Jakarta Homes

    Prestigious Lifestyle

    When you live in this prestigious Jakarta real estate, going anywhere is a breeze. Not far from Soekarno Hatta International Airport, Pantai Mutiara offers many lifestyle and entertainment activities. Emporium Mall, Jetski Café, Baywalk Mall and Sports Complex. This prized Jakarta real estate received The First & The Best Reclamation Residentials Property & Bank Awards in 2015. Boasting 24-hour security, private yacht jetties, multiple Sports Clubs and entertainment hot spots, Pantai Mutiara is the ideal Jakarta homes for those who value elegance.

    Watch sunset from various spots around Pantai Mutiara. This 100-hectare area has expanded from a simple housing complex to the most sought-after Jakarta real estate. Its design is similar to elite beach style Hollywood homes with private jetty in the backyard where you can park your private yacht. Your home should be heaven on earth, distinctly different from other Jakarta homes. After a day’s work, enjoy the beautiful sunset view, release all tension by strolling by the beach or simply relax and sit. Align your soul with nature through the beauty of the sea, lush greeneries and the cool air of Pantai Mutiara.

    Food and Entertainment at their best

    If you would like something more adventurous around this Jakarta real estate, try the Jetski Café, where all jet ski activities in Jakarta are. You can choose from many shapes, sizes, models, and colors. When you are done, challenge your taste buds with some culinary treats. Choose from three locations: indoor for a quiet no-breeze environment, the left side with some swinging chairs for soft, gentle wind and the other side with beach view. No other Jakarta homes have this many facilities!

    Jetski Cafe opens from four in the afternoon until midnight. This café is designed for sunset viewing and spending memorable time with family and friends. Seafood delicacies and fresh juices awaits you! You can also experience social fun at Beach Cafe or make special reservation at D’banquet Pantai Mutiara to celebrate special moments like office or family gathering, birthday party, wedding party, etc. These Jakarta homes are perfect for closeness of same taste community members.

    Healthy and Fun Activities

    Enjoy a healthier lifestyle and fun activities at Pantai Mutiara Swimming Pool. It is the only international Olympic-sized swimming pool in Pluit, North Jakarta. Pantai Mutiara Swimming Pool is a great place to practice for aspiring future athletes and the community alike. Take your kids for some swimming lessons or a leisurely dive with 5-star facilities and strict maintenance policies. After swimming, enjoy the sea view from Beach Cafe where you can order anything from ice cream to your favorite satay.

    Pantai Mutiara Sports Club offers various sporting activities to satisfy your sense of competition. The only international standard indoor mini soccer field in Indonesia, Oceano Football Stadium uses grade A FIFA standard synthetic grass, the best quality from Italy. Play basketball with friends and family members on a seaside court or take some casual strokes of table tennis or ping pong there. After a few games of sports you can cool down at De 'bleu Cafe and enjoy the sea view. A truly valuable addition for your Pantai Mutiara Jakarta real estate. The Sports Hall caters for Badminton, Basketball, Futsal, and Volley Ball. You can hold a big enough competition complete with a spacious spectator tribune. No other Jakarta homes have this comprehensive facilities!

    Fitness Center for all your needs

    In a holistic wellness spirit, Pantai Mutiara Fitness Center offers many activities suitable for all levels. Complete facilities and equipment are guaranteed for maximal comfort. Swimming pool, badminton, tennis and 3-on-3 basketball courts, functional training and freestyle area, yoga and aerobic studios, gym are yours to choose.

    Depending on your fitness level and preference, select from special classes like Aerobic, Tae Bo, Zumba Dance, Body Language, Pump It, Step In, Low Intensity Aero, dan Yoga. There are few, if not none, Jakarta real estate that boast these kind of varieties in one place. Other facilities include hot and cold showers, lockers, sauna room, lounge, cafe, and plenty of parking space. Another great offer from one of the best Jakarta homes to date!

    The Perfect Choice

    Pantai Mutiara is the perfect choice for a luxurious living in a prestigious area of Jakarta – the most sought-after Jakarta real estate – where convenience, view and coastal atmosphere create an elegant lifestyle.
